pr_title: Add Warmup API to load indices graphs into memory

timeline.message: changed to use searcher for getting index reader
changed interace for loading multiple hnsw segments
added test cases for warmup api
WIP: rest test cases for Warmup
adding not k-NN index exception handling in rest layer
added rest test cases for warmup API

timeline.bodyText: remove "the Index" and just leave "the IndexShard"?
timeline.author: kaituo

replies.bodyText: I think I wiil change to "We do not perform validation that the index the shard is from"
replies.author: jmazanec15

timeline.author: kaituo

replies.bodyText: resolve(fileName) should not return null because we get the fileNames from the indexReader. However, I can add a test case to confirm the behavior.

timeline.bodyText:
+1 for making it async.
we could log here saying that warm up initiated. Should we capture the number of warmup requests in the knn stats?
timeline.author: vamshin

replies.bodyText: I can add the log statement. I am not sure if it is useful to know how many warmup requests there have been.
replies.author: jmazanec15

timeline.bodyText:
We could update log to tell the exact setting name. How about below message

throw new KNNInvalidIndexException(index.getName(),
"Warmup request rejected as one of the index has 'index.knn' setting set to false");


Should we loop through the indices and mention full list of indices that are invalid instead of exiting on the first error?


How about making indexNames from String array to set and pass this as a ImmutableSet to KNNWarmupRequest. This was we could avoid duplicates.
timeline.author: vamshin

replies.bodyText:
Makes sense
Yes, I think that would be better design.
Yes that makes sense. Will change that.
replies.author: jmazanec15

replies.bodyText: For Point 3, KNNWarmupRequest extends BroadcastRequest which takes an array of indices. So, I do not think I should modify that. Additionally, KNNWarmupTransportAction extends TransportBroadcastByNodeAction, which deduplicates the indices here, so I am not sure change 3 is necessary.
replies.author: jmazanec15

replies.bodyText: For 1, do we want to return the index name that has 'index.knn' setting to be false?
replies.author: kaituo

replies.bodyText: Correct. Actually list of index names that have index.knn setting to false.
